des: "Oatmeal Molasses Bread via the bread machine.   I often just use the dough cycle, take the dough out when done, and let it rise on more time. I then bake it in the oven at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 28 minutes.  The texture is just like a real homemade loaf. Enjoy!!!!!"
ins:
Place ingredients in the pan of the bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer.
Select White Bread setting, and Start.
